law.catch_line: To qualify for a license, an applicant shall satisfy the Commissioner that:...
law.text:
To qualify for a license, an applicant shall satisfy the Commissioner that:
The applicant's business will promote the convenience and advantage of the community in which the applicant's place of business, or mobile unit, will be located; and
The applicant or, if the applicant is not an individual, each of the owners, officers, directors, or principals of the entity:
Has sufficient experience, character, financial responsibility, and general fitness to:
Command the confidence of the public; and
Warrant the belief that the business will be operated lawfully, honestly, fairly, and efficiently; and
Has not committed any act that would be a ground for suspension or revocation of a license under this subtitle.
